who_the_heck_is_that.question: This titular titular protagonist is whisked to Morning Land where he must do battle with Dark Raven!
Unite Hand! Will Wedgewood is a mild mannered school teacher, but when the fate of the world is hanging by a thread he'll transform into this super hero.
Alone initially, this character later befriends Chris, John, Claire, Laura, James, and Sarah
As a commanding officer, this character commands the forces of Orange Star
As a child soldier he earned the nickname 'Jack the Ripper' due to his incredibly high kill rate. While his name really is Jack, only his current name is valid.
